content:
Announcing SUSHI 0.12.4 with the following fix:

  • Update _updatePublisher scripts to use the new IG Publisher location

For some more details (but not many more), see the release notes: https://github.com/FHIR/sushi/releases/tag/v0.12.4

If you've been using SUSHI and noticed that _updatePublisher has been failing to update the publisher, it is because the IG Publisher was moved to a new location, so SUSHI 0.12.4 should fix that for you.
